results.title: Wound Trauma Exacerbates Acute, but not Delayed, Effects of Radiation in Rats: Mitigation by Lisinopril
results.text_hl: The hazard ratio was 0.03 with 95% confidence interval of 0.004-0.262, indicating an over 30+ times decrease in @<m>DISEASE_614963</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:614963 @@@morbidity@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.
